https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1RQMjstF4zELxzflUkiV9MiJaqd.jpg An ex-soldier struggles to adjust after the Gulf War. But when his commanding officer is killed in a suspected mugging, he tries to find the truth. A Landscape of Lies
